page.title: 18LEISURE- CUCKFIELD ADULTS
page.content: Many adults swim regularly at Haywards Heath leisure centre. TV is not regarded as important, few watch it for more than 2 hrs per day and few people own videos. The most popular programmes are news items and documentaries. Radio 2 is popular. Classical music is more widely listened to than pop. Few adults ever go to discos. Computers are popular, most are used for playing games. Reading is a favourite pastime, most adults being members of a library. The most unpopular jobs around the home are washing up and ironing. With regard to holidays, 3-5 weeks is the average, most people going abroad at least once a year, preferring to stay in hotels, their favourite place being France. Few adults smoke, most enjoy eating out. On the whole adults feel leisure facilities in the area good.
